name: Through The Forest (Moirai)
description:
You need to escape the forest!!

There are a lot of monster ahead.

Use the 360 degree rotatable mounted gun on the car.

They just won't die somehow, but it looks like your weapon can slow them down.

Don't let them get you!! just HIT THE GAS!!

How to Play :

press W - to move forward 

press S - to move backward

use Mouse - to rotate the gun

press LEFT CLICK - to shoot 

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Music : Suspense Scary Music by Oak Studio

Sprite & Model : Kenney • Free game assets

An Entry for Kenney Game Jam 2021
